arn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the rule

excludedAccounts.description: List of AWS account identifiers to exclude from the rule

inputParameters.description: A string in JSON format that is passed to the AWS Config Rule Lambda Function

lambdaFunctionArn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the rule Lambda Function

maximumExecutionFrequency.description: The maximum frequency with which AWS Config runs evaluations for a rule, if the rule is triggered at a periodic frequency. Defaults to `TwentyFour_Hours` for periodic frequency triggered rules. Valid values: `One_Hour`, `Three_Hours`, `Six_Hours`, `Twelve_Hours`, or `TwentyFour_Hours`.

resourceIdScope.description: Identifier of the AWS resource to evaluate

resourceTypesScopes.description: List of types of AWS resources to evaluate

tagKeyScope.description: Tag key of AWS resources to evaluate

tagValueScope.description: Tag value of AWS resources to evaluate

triggerTypes.description: List of notification types that trigger AWS Config to run an evaluation for the rule. Valid values: `ConfigurationItemChangeNotification`, `OversizedConfigurationItemChangeNotification`, and `ScheduledNotification`
